call_summary: Customer reported that her AutoMow 3000 suddenly stopped operating. Agent walked her through a power-cycle and checked the onboard error log (connectivity fault). A ticket was opened and the customer was assured the issue would be resolved by 2024-01-10.

sdc: Was asking about the expired Aquaspray X promotion.
call_summary: Customer inquired about a recently expired promotional offer on the Aquaspray X robotic washer. Explained that the promotion had ended and recommended joining the mailing list to receive notifications on future deals. Customer accepted the suggestion. No further issues were reported. Resolution was expected immediately as no follow-up action was required.
